subject: Coaches and Managers
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: While Alain Vigneault was enjoying the first moments of his five-year contract, the former Rangers coach John Tortorella was on a flight to Vancouver, where he was expected to be named the Canucks’ coach.
snippet: While Alain Vigneault was enjoying the first moments of his five-year contract, the former Rangers coach John Tortorella was on a flight to Vancouver, where he was expected to be named the Canucks’ coach.
